summary: Correct the of the Shrouded Cowl, Shrouded Cowl Maskless, Ancient Shrouded Cowl, and Worn Shrouded Cowl, for the Khajit Male and Female Players. Allows for Upgrading of the Worn Shrouded Armor set at a Work bench. Includes 2 files, one of which will allow you to equip the Head Gear along with Circlets. *Read Install Instructions Notes*
descriptionHtml:
Corrects the look of
• Shrouded Cowl
• Shrouded Cowl Maskless
• Ancient Shrouded Hood
• Worn Shrouded Hood

for Kajiit Characters, both male and female.

Allows upgrading of any piece of the Worn Shrouded Armor set at any Work Bench. 

*** Install Notes ***
Unrar/Extract the file to your Data folder within your Skyrim game Directory

Use your favorite data file manager (or skyrim launcher) to set up which file to load and it\'s load order. - A word of caution to the order. if you make use of any other mods that modify Hoods or Circlets, make sure this mod is listed AFTER the other mod, as they likely modify the same files.

*** Support ***
Absolutely NO support is available.
This file is simply the result of frustration and disappointment after equipping the Ancient Shrouded hood on my male Khajiit character.
Works for me, and I figured I\'d share it, but will absolutely not provide any support, hand holding, or babysitting for ANYONE.
author: SlayerEmperor
